name: season_episodes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool netflix_v2.
Tool description: Netflix data API provides details, stats and information of TV shows, movies, series, documentaries and more.
API description: Fetch episodes for a given season from the Netflix RapidAPI.

ids.description: Season IDs (separated by commas) for which episodes are to be fetched.

lang.description: Language code for the episodes. Defaults to 'en'.

limit.description: The maximum number of episodes to return. Defaults to 25.

offset.description: The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.
